sentences.en: All the scattered materials should clean up in time on scaffolding.
sentences.cn: 4脚手架上零星材料及时清理干净.

sentences.en: Altogether seven inmates escaped by scaling a wall and climbing down scaffolding.
sentences.cn: 总共有7名犯人攀墙从脚手架上爬下来逃走了。

sentences.en: Double scaffold outside the structure will be built by scaffolding company.
sentences.cn: 1框架外的双排脚手架由架业公司搭设.
他的工厂生产脚手架部件.

sentences.en: Permit to work - hot work, excavation, confined space entry, scaffolding erection.
sentences.cn: 开作业票 -- 动火作业, 开挖, 限制空间进入, 脚手架安装,栅栏拆.

sentences.en: Scaffolding does not anything to save construction costs hangers.
sentences.cn: 不搭脚手架,节省建筑架子费用.

sentences.en: Scaffolding has been erected around the tower.
sentences.cn: 塔的周围已竖起了脚手架.

sentences.en: Scaffolding was made from wooden poles, lashed together with ropes and chains.
sentences.cn: 很多木杆被绳子和锁链牢牢系在一起,搭成了脚手架.

sentences.en: The main products are Architectural hardware, scaffolding, Die - Accessories.
sentences.cn: 主要产品建筑五金 、 脚手架 、 模架系统配件.

sentences.en: The men scaled a wall and climbed down scaffolding on the other side.
sentences.cn: 那些男人攀上一堵墙然后顺着另一侧的脚手架爬了下去。

sentences.en: The snail points to his mucus trailing the iron scaffolding.
sentences.cn: 蜗牛指着铁架上留下粘溶液的痕迹说.

sentences.en: The steel scaffolding fell down and narrowly missed a couple of bystanders.
sentences.cn: 钢制脚手架倒了下来,差点儿砸着几个站在旁边观看的人.

sentences.en: The workmen are now taking down the scaffolding round the building.
sentences.cn: 工人们正在拆卸建筑物周围的脚手架.

sentences.en: The workmen rigged up some tubular scaffolding at once.
sentences.cn: 工人们立刻搭了个管子脚手架.

sentences.en: They are taking down a crane [ the scaffolding ].
sentences.cn: 他们正在拆吊车 [ 脚手架 ].

sentences.en: Workers have erected scaffolding around the base of the tower below the roadway.
sentences.cn: 工人们已经在车行道下的塔基四周竖起了脚手架。

words.tran_cn: 给…搭脚手架；用支架支撑
脚手架；搭脚手架的材料

trans.tran_cn: 搭脚手架的材料，脚手架材料
trans.tran_en: a set of poles and boards that are built into a structure for workers to stand on when they are working on the outside of a building
